data.speaker: Player
data.content: It's a newspaper, which reported a lab accident.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (Title:CCT Lab Incident Resulted in multiple deaths.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("December 5th 2020, 45 lab workers of CCT lab died from the virus leak. ")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("According to relevant sources, the cause of the incident is due to the improper operation of one of the experimenters.")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("Experts say the virus has the potential to spread further, therefore, attention should be paid to it.")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ("At present, the incident is under further investigation")

data.speaker: Player
data.content: （"List of victims: Tomas Simons, Raken Fiora, Sun Booker..."）

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I don't understand, is this a prank?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Lev was lying there, talking to me earlier, he can't be someone died in the lab incident.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Everything got weird after I woke up in class.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Anyway, the most important thing now is to save Lev, no time to waste.
